DOC.brief_summary: Target concentration infusion ( TCI ) remifentanil ( 2.0ng/ml ) suppresses cough induced endotracheal tube effectively intravenous administration lidocaine ( 1.5mg/kg ) .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Lidocaine Remifentanil Effect Responses Endotracheal Tube During Emergence From General Anesthesia
DOC.criteria: Females older 20 year old Patients acute chronic respiratory disease , hypertension , gastroesophageal reflux disease , preoperative sedative mucolytics , current smoker .
